name: Vargin Road-Dirty wedding ceremony and the ring of the chapel bell
name_original: Vargin Road-Dirty wedding ceremony and the ring of the chapel bell
description:
****** Story ******

It's a wedding ceremony today.
Two couples are ringing the chapel bell.
Two happy brides, Layla and Rianna.
The two grooms are erected to think of the night they will have with the pretty brides.

They have their families, friends, relatives in the ceremony, and the pastor are having the wedding vows.
The two couples are in the happiest moment, and they are about to kiss each other, but...


****** Revenge ******

Monsters has come to the wedding and raped the two brides.
White dresses are torn, big tits are shown, and the nipples are beatiful pink.
They kept their virgin till today, but they were raped ruthlessly.
The wedding became a rape show, and one groom were killed.
The other groom run away to see brides pregnant.

"No...I can't... can't marry you any more...
Layla...you got a lot of monster's sperm...in your pussy. Oh my god."

Two brides were in despair. Raped and ravaged.
But the brides decided to have their revenge.
But they didn't know they would have more nightmare...


****** Adventure ******

They will have an adventure, unknown towns, forests and dungeon.
Sometimes they will see beautiful views. Rest in peace.

But the monsters are strong.
Especially, the big ones. Need to have strategies.
And for sure, if you lose, you will get ravaged and raped.

During the battle, you will get "Armor break".
The more damage you get, the more your wedding dress get torn.
Young brides pretty bodies will be shown.
